actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for the monthly publication of a consumer price index for the aged and other social security beneficiaries, which shall be used in the provision of the cost-of-living benefit increases authorized by title II of Social Security Act.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of Labor to prepare a "Consumer Price Index for the Aged and Other Social Security Beneficiaries". Directs that such publication be used in determining cost-of-living benefit increases for those receiving assistance under title II (Federal Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the monthly publication of a consumer price index for the aged and other social security beneficiaries, which shall be used in the provision of the cost-of-living benefit increases authorized by title II of Social Security Act.
